Ronbun 論文

Ronbun (paper) is my static site generator. It's build in nodejs and uses Kaku as a markup language. It requires imagemagick on the server to process images.

Ronbun uses a single .kaku file as a source of data. It parses the file and generates html. Ronbun and the Kaku parser try as much as possible to provide light pages and assets by using standard HTML techniques like native lazyloading.

A rewrite of Ronbun should be done in the future in a another language to allow faster compilation time and lower requirements, possibly in Python or C.
